Hi Noah,

I added the line to logging.properties:

org.archive.modules.dec=
iderules.DecideRuleSequence.level =3D FINEST

and also included .html file =
type in the decide rule. But I am still not getting the desired results . A=
ll it crawls is image files like .gif , .jpg and pdf files. Do you think I =
am doing something wrong in other beans except the decide rules ? 

Thanks =
,
Deepa

--- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, Noah Levitt <nlevitt@...> =
wrote:
>
> Hello Deepa, 
> 
> I ran a test crawl with your NotMatchesFilePa=
tternDecideRule and got the expected results. 
> 
> You might want to try a=
dding this line to logging.properties:
> 
> org.archive.modules.deciderules=
.DecideRuleSequence.level =3D FINEST
> 
> It will tell you the result of ea=
ch decide rule and the final decision for each url. 
> 
> (Unfortunately it=
 wasn't logging the url in question, but I've added that and I think the la=
test build at http://builds.archive.org:8080 should have it.)
> 
> One thin=
g to keep in mind is that very few urls will be discovered if you restrict =
crawling exclusively to css. Since html won't be crawled, css referred to i=
n the uncrawled html will not be discovered.
> 
> Noah
> 
> 
> DEEPA R wrot=
e:
> > Hi, 
> > 
> > I am trying to narrow my crawl by allowing only css ty=
pes of files to be accepted. For this I am using the "NotMatchesFilePattern=
DecideRule" with the properties like :
> > 
> >   <bean class=3D"org.archiv=
e.modules.deciderules.NotMatchesFilePatternDecideRule">
> >       <property=
 name=3D"decision" value=3D"REJECT" />
> >       <property name=3D"regex" v=
alue=3D".*(/|\.css)$" /> 
> >  </bean>
> > 
> > with the other rules in thi=
s order , as on the manual :
> > 
> >    1. RejectDecideRule
> >    2. Surt=
PrefixedDecideRule
> >    3. TooManyHopsDecideRule
> >    4. PathologicalPa=
thDecideRule
> >    5. TooManyPathSegmentsDecideRule
> >    6. NotMatchesFi=
lePatternDecideRule
> >    7. PrerequisiteAcceptDecideRule
> > 
> > But I a=
m getting all types of files like pdf , images and not getting the css file=
s . I am not able to figure out where am I going wrong. Any help is greatly=
 appreciated.
> > 
> > Thanks.
> >
>
